title: Divya Nakshatra Haaram: Diamond & Gemstone Cascade
materials: featuring brilliant-cut diamonds (వజ్రాలు) of VS clarity and G-H color. The centerpieces include a ruby (మాణిక్యం) of approximately 1 carat and an emerald (పచ్చ) of approximately 1.5 carats. Accented with South Sea Pearls (ముత్యాలు) of AAAA quality.
features: This breathtaking Haaram features a delicate floral and filigree design, expertly crafted with intricate diamond settings. The central ruby and emerald add a vibrant pop of color and focal point. Dangles of lustrous South Sea pearls create a graceful cascade effect. The design incorporates traditional South Indian motifs with a modern touch, suitable for both grand occasions and contemporary events.
colors: with a striking contrast from the red of the ruby and the green of the emerald. The pearls offer a soft
occasions: and other significant celebrations. Ideal for Muhurtham
or even a grand evening party. A stunning heirloom piece to be treasured for generations.
description: This Nakshatra Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The high-quality diamonds and precious gemstones are carefully selected for their brilliance and beauty. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and longevity. A symbol of prosperity and good fortune, this piece is more than just jewelry; it's an investment and a legacy.
